## Project overview

The purpose of this project is to gain some insight into WGCNA pipeline.

All the results and plots presented in the pages below should be
reproduceable on your computer. Follow the
[Setup Instructions](setup.html) if you are interested in reproducing
the results for yourself.

These are the results of my analyses. They were generated by rendering
the [R Markdown documents](https://github.com/xiayh17/wgcna-workflow/tree/master/analysis)
into webpages.

1. [表达值筛选和cpm处理.](FilterAndCpm-analysis.html) 

2. [寻找软阈值.](FindPower.html)

3. [我的模块分的还好吗?](ModuleOK.html)
